observation: Abacus - Abacus Manufacturers, Abacus supplier And Abacus exporter  Send Email 08048968779 70% Response Rate Search Introduction What We Offer Contact Us Calculation Aids Student Abacus Teacher Abacus Abacus Kit Kids Abacus Abacus Books Face shield for covid 19 Welcome to Bharat Flow Controls Nature of Business Exporter and Manufacturer Total Number of Employees 26 to 50 People Year of Establishment 2000 Partnership Firm 2012-13 Rs. 2 - 5 Crore Approx. 32070***** 33AAIFB2599M2Z0 IndiaMART Trust Seal Verified We use qualitative raw material in the production process which is procured from reliable vendors. Some of our raw material includes wood, plastic granules, poly propylene, abs, nylon, HIPs, poly carbonate and styrene. Our wide collection of abacus for human brain development is available in categories such as student abacus, teacher abacus, mathematical abacus and many more. Our cutting edge technology in our production unit helps us to cater to the growing requirements of clients across the globe. Backed by our latest technology we are able to offer 50000 student abacus and 500 teacher abacus every month. Our capability in handling latest technology through our proficient professionals enables us to customize our range as per the client requirement and specifications. Our industrious professionals test our whole range at different stages to ensure durability, strength, thickness and size. more... Tell Us What Are You Looking For ? Thank you Showcase Gallery Contact via E-mail Contact via SMS K. Shanmughasundaram (Managing Partner) No. 7/44-2, Pappanaickenpalayam Road, Kanuvai Industrial Estate Coimbatore Call Us: Call Response Rate: 70% Share Us : F T L Company Presentation Company Video Company Brochure Home Site Map Â© Terms of Use IndiaMART InterMESH Limited
